mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vehicle_info_manage (brand, model, vehicle_type, seat, product_source, manufacturer, color, fuel_type, engine_type, vin, product_date, price, owner, used_unit) VALUES (#{brand},#{model},#{vehicleType},#{seat},#{productSource},#{manufacturer},#{color}, #{fuelType},#{engineType},#{vin},#{productDate},#{price},#{owner},#{usedUnit})
mapper.select: select * from vehicle_info_manage where brand like "%"#{queryInformation}"%"
select * from vehicle_info_manage where model like "%"#{queryInformation}"%"
select * from vehicle_info_manage where vehicle_type like "%"#{queryInformation}"%"
select * from vehicle_info_manage where seat like "%"#{queryInformation}"%"
select * from vehicle_info_manage where used_unit like "%"#{queryInformation}"%"
